statements: SELECT * FROM digital_marketing_roi;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_revenue FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, total_conversions FROM digital_marketing_roi ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue, total_clicks FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, total_conversions FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE total_revenue > 5000 AND total_conversions > 50 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, total_clicks ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, total_revenue FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC, total_revenue DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, total_clicks, total_conversions, total_revenue FROM digital_marketing_roi WHERE budget > 10000 AND total_revenue < 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, budget, platform FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM analytics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM campaigns INNER JOIN analytics ON campaigns.campaign_id = analytics.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM campaigns JOIN analytics ON campaigns.campaign_id = analytics.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, platform, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaigns LEFT JOIN analytics ON campaigns.campaign_id = analytics.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id, platform HAVING total_conversions > 10;

SELECT campaign_name, revenue, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM campaigns JOIN analytics ON campaigns.campaign_id = analytics.campaign_id WHERE DATE(date) BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks, impressions, cost, revenue FROM campaigns LEFT JOIN analytics ON campaigns.campaign_id = analytics.campaign_id WHERE cost > 1000 AND revenue < 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Clicks';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(allocation_amount) AS total_allocation FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns JOIN CampaignMetrics ON DigitalMarketingCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE date_measured = '2022-01-15'
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(allocation_amount) AS total_allocation FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns JOIN CampaignMetrics ON DigitalMarketingCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM DigitalMarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM digital_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE clicks > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, conversions FROM digital_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type, is_active FROM marketing_channels WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions, budget FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM digital_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, conversions FROM digital_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM digital_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type, is_active FROM marketing_channels WHERE is_active = TRUE;

SELECT campaign_name, channel_name, spend, roi FROM digital_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON digital_marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id JOIN marketing_channels ON campaign_performance.channel_id = marketing_channels.channel_id WHERE budget > spend;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, bid_amount FROM AdGroups WHERE bid_amount > 50 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_text, cost_per_click, click_through_rate FROM Ads WHERE cost_per_click < 5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT city, device_type FROM Clicks WHERE city = 'New York' AND device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY city, device_type;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_text, cost_per_click, click_through_rate FROM Ads ORDER BY cost_per_click DESC;
SELECT ad_group_name, sum(bid_amount) AS total_bid_amount FROM AdGroups GROUP BY ad_group_name;
SELECT city, device_type, count(*) AS click_count FROM Clicks GROUP BY city, device_type ORDER BY click_count DESC;
